title: How to fetch more than the default number(100) of records from database?
description: Variables provide data integration for the widgets. Variables are the gateways for the users to control, manage and synchronize the data from the database/web service or any other service in the backend. In case user wants to fetch the record from database and show it in select widget.

frontMatter.title: How to fetch more than the default number(100) of records from database?
